name: src/adj.js
adj
description:
Constructs the adjacency list for an undirected unweighted connected
loopless multigraph G given as a list of edges.

name: src/index.js
src/maxback/_contract.js
_contract
description:
Given G and some ordering, computes the graph H obtained from G by
contracting all edges between the last two vertices of the ordering.

name: src/maxback/_order.js
_order
description:
Lists the vertices of an undirected unweighted connected loopless multigraph
G in max-back order.

unknown.tagValue: {Iterable} The vertices of G in max-back order.

return.description: The vertices of G in max-back order.

name: src/maxback/_smallcuts.js
_smallcuts
description:
Yields the small cuts of undirected unweighted connected loopless multigraph G.
At least one of them must be a minimum cut.

name: src/maxback/index.js
src/maxback/maxback.js
maxback
description: Convenience wrapper around Nagamochi-Ibaraki poly-time algorithm.

unknown.tagValue: {Iterable} An iterable over the edges of a minimum cut of G.

params.name: edges
params.description: List of edges of an undirected unweighted connected loopless multigraph G.

return.description: An iterable over the edges of a minimum cut of G.

name: src/maxback/mb.js

unknown.tagValue: {Array} A pair [U,cutsize] reprensenting a minimum cut of G.

params.name: G
params.description: The adjacency list of an undirected unweighted connected loopless multigraph G.

return.description: A pair [U,cutsize] reprensenting a minimum cut of G.

name: src/mincut.js
src/outgoingedges.js
outgoingedges
description:
Yields all edges of an undirected unweighted connected loopless multigraph G
that have one endpoint inside some vertex subset U and that have the other
endpoint inside of V = V(G) \ U.

unknown.tagValue: {Iterable} The edges of G going from U to V(G) \ U.

params.name: G
params.description: The input undirected unweighted connected loopless multigraph.

return.description: The edges of G going from U to V(G) \ U.

content:
:haircut_woman: [@graph-algorithm/minimum-cut](https://graph-algorithm.github.io/minimum-cut)
==

Minimum cut algorithms for JavaScript.
Parent is [js-algorithms](https://github.com/make-github-pseudonymous-again/js-algorithms).
See [docs](https://graph-algorithm.github.io/minimum-cut/index.html).

```js
// 5      2
// |\    /|
// | 0--1 |
// |/    \|
// 4      3
mincut([[0,1],[1,2],[1,3],[2,3],[0,4],[0,5],[4,5]]); // 0--1
```

name: ./README.md
package.json
./doc/manual/installation.md
content:
# Installation

Can be managed using
[jspm](http://jspm.io)
or [npm](https://github.com/npm/npm).

### jspm
```terminal
jspm install npm:@graph-algorithm/minimum-cut
```

### npm
```terminal
npm install @graph-algorithm/minimum-cut --save
```

name: ./doc/manual/usage.md
